note: the part of the case to which the row belongs (A, B, C, etc)
the subsection of the gross to which the row belongs (for instance, a field in a TAH-BSO could be part of the "ovary", "fallopian tube", "uterus" or other sections)
the name of the field reported (eg tumor size, weight of the specimen, etc)
the value of the field, in text format regardless of whether it's actually numeric or not.
